title: Manchester City full back Oleksandr Zinchenko wildly celebrates win over Portugal
text:
Manchester City full back Oleksandr Zinchenko couldn't hide his excitement after Ukraine beat Portugal to qualify for next year's European Championship.

Zinchenko was part of the side that beat Portugal 2-1 in Kyiv on Monday night following goals from Roman Yaremchuk and Andriy Yarmolenko.

The win strengthened Ukraine's standing at the top of Group B and also confirmed the nation's qualification for next summer's tournament.

Oleksandr Zinchenko with girlfriend Vlada Sedan after Ukraine qualify for Euro 2020

Zinchenko interrupted Andriy Yarmolenko's interview live on Ukrainian television

Zinchenko then ran in front of the television camera and started chanting: 'We are at the Euro!'

After the game, Zinchenko was interviewed on Ukrainian television and punched the air several times as he was unable to control himself.

In a video posted on social media, the 22-year-old can be seen shouting into the camera as team-mate Yarmolenko laughs in the background.

His girlfriend, Vlada Sedan, a TV presenter, was broadcasting when he got himself live on air although this time he stopped short of kissing her on the cheek.

Zinchenko shows his emotion at full-time after Ukraine beat Portugal 2-1 in Kyiv on Monday

Zinchenko attempts to win the ball off Portugal captain Cristiano Ronaldo on Monday night

'We're at the Euro!' Zinchenko shouts several times before eventually calming himself down.

Yarmolenko can't get a word in as the left back continues before belting out: 'Championies!'

At one point he even dances around the table as the presenters of another station have to cut their broadcast before his celebrations finally come to an end.

Zinchenko pictured with girlfriend Vlada while the pair were on holiday in the summer

The Manchester City full back is a regular feature on his girlfriend's Instagram account

Earlier this year, Zinchenko planted a kiss on his girlfriend's cheek after Ukraine beat Serbia 5-0.

The show of affection went viral on social media - following previous rumours that they were dating.

Sedan lives with Zinchenko in Manchester and recently posed for a picture with City boss Pep Guardiola.

Zinchenko broke interview protocol with TV reporter Sedan when Ukraine beat Serbia 5-0
description: Manchester City full back Oleksandr Zinchenko couldn't hide his excitement after Ukraine beat Portugal to qualify for next year's European Championship.
